title: Senior Technical Support Engineer (Band-7)
description: • Launched and led support team and strategy for new product support mission IBM ODM
• Cooperated with development teams to fix 16 defects and proposed 8 enhancements from five products
• Won awards including NPS Star Awards, Standout New-Comer RockIT Award, Restricted Stock Units Equity Award

title: Technical Support Engineer (Band-7)
description: • Provided technical support assistance using phone and remote video sessions to global customers including individuals and corporate clients, such as Boeing, Samsung; Collaborated with technical support specialists and developers from U.S. and Europe
• Troubleshot and resolved more than 400 technical issues for five different products
• Launched a podcast about machine learning and published it to 346k worldwide IBMers. Got lots of appreciative comments

• Increased customer reviews in a fast-paced and pandemic environment. Contributed a quarter of the perfect-10-score NPS feedbacks among 23 teammates, helped our team rise from seventh to first in customer satisfaction out of the 10 worldwide teams

title: Developer Intern
description: • Wrote HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop an Enterprise Live Streaming Platform based on WeChat Mini Program
• Utilized Tencent Cloud to achieve a fully-fledged live streaming web player with live commenting, voice- and video-chatting
• Launched on WeChat on Jan. 2020. Exceeded one million users in Jul. 2020

title: Software Intern
description: • Developed a Visualized DBMS with SQLite and a Raman Spectrometer Files Format Converter program following MVC Pattern and GUI Architectures using Qt and C++, solved the long-existing data format inconsistency issue for the company
• Optimized the code structure and reduced code redundancy by 57%
